history.subject: SKY Happiness Retreat: Must-do Workshop for more Connection, Confidence, and Productivity

history.content:
We are happy to announce the nationally acclaimed SKY Happiness Retreat is coming to UC Berkeley – right online!

 

Join in on this powerful weekend retreat filled with evidence-based meditation and breath-work practices, social connection, self-development and stress-management skills which bring calm, clarity and happiness.

 

DEC 4-6

ON ZOOM

Do something for yourself! REGISTER HERE 

NEW Yale research shows SKY Breath Meditation more effective than mindfulness

Stress, anxiety, depression—the US statistics are alarming and increasing at a rapid rate. It’s now become essential for everyone to know how to manage their mental health, either as a preventative practice or for the management of a condition.

A new Yale study, featuring three wellness interventions in a randomized control trial, including our SKY Breath Meditation, reveals valuable insight into how the breath can enhance a range of well-being markers—the results are astounding. 

SKY Breath Meditation is available to the general public through the Art of Living and is taught on university campuses through SKY Campus Happiness.

Yale Research & Testimonial Video

“I felt alive, I felt energized, I felt awake. I cannot remember a day I was more productive." 

-Ben, Yale undergraduate

From Forbes to Pop Sugar, the breath is in the news – and there's a great reason why. Read more to find out. 

 

     FORBES // How To Decrease Back To College Anxiety: Just Breathe

 

“College students returning to campus is a stress for many. Containing COVID-19as students return from all over the country and assuring proper social distancing measures and mask wearing is one component, but helping support their mental health needs is another entirely…”

READ MORE

POPSUGAR // If Traditional Meditation Makes You Anxious, You Need to Try SKY Breath Meditation
 

“If you've been curious about meditation and the benefits but find yourself saying things like, "It's impossible for me to sit still and focus," a new offering called SKY Breath Meditation can help improve your mental health without making you feel antsy and anxious…”

READ MORE
